source_objects.title: Project Management
source_objects.description: Master Project Management with courses on: PMI RMP, PRINCE Foundation certification, software project management, CBAP, project planning and execution.

items.headline: How to manage successfully a consulting project  - practical guide for Project Managers
objectives_summary: Manage Consulting Project with your eyes closed
Finish the project ahead of time and below the agreed budget
Create value for the customer that will help you sell new projects

items.title: Risk Management Professional: Prep for the PMI-RMP Exam
items.headline: The official Risk Management Professional training that you need for the PMI-RMP exam
objectives_summary: Describe and understand all Project Risk Management processes, as outlined in the PMI® PMBOK® Guide 5th  Edition
Gain the necessary information to prepare for the PMI® Risk Management Professional (PMI-RMP®) Certification Exam
Use internationally-recognized  best practices for managing risks

items.title: Effective Communication Skills: Stakeholder Analysis
items.headline: Master the gold standard tool for project management, change management and software implementation
objectives_summary: You'll learn how to sell ideas internally and externally.
You'll be able to help the sales team close more deals.
You'll be able to navigate successfully through a client's organization.

items.title: Program Management Course - Program Manager Essentials

items.title: Project Management: Deliver on Time + Scrum Project Delivery

items.headline: Learn how to Meet Deadlines Consistently with Project Management Essentials using Scrum for Continuous Delivery On Time
objectives_summary: Learn how to meet a project deadline and improve project delivery using agile scrum and project management essentials techniques.
Learn what scrum is and why it is so powerful for delivering projects on time to a high degree of quality
Learn how checklists can be used to help deliver project value on time

items.title: LEED Green Associate V4 Exam | 4 Full Practice Tests

items.headline: LEED GA best seller exams were prepared by an approved LEED USGBC Faculty in accordance with the GBCI LEED GA exams.
objectives_summary: You will most likely pass the LEED® GREEN ASSOCIATE™ exam from the first attempt.
You will understand LEED Rating system process and different certification and accreditation levels.
You will be familiar with green building practices and strategies associated with LEED.

items.title: Get Kanban Organised: From To-Do To Done With Kanban Boards
items.headline: Introduction to Kanban boards for teams or personal projects. Includes demos of Trello, online Kanban boards & JIRA.
objectives_summary: The principle of Limit Work In progress and how this helps manage workflow
How to use a digital or physical Kanban board for a team project or personal tasks
How to set up and manage tasks on a project in JIRA using a Kanban board

items.title: PgMP (Program Management Professional) Exam Prep Course
items.headline: PgMP 4th Edition Exam prep course by PMI Authorized instructor + 2 Full Exams + 450 Questions + 8 PDU's + 15 Documents
objectives_summary: This course teaches program management as per the PMI standard 4th edition
Tips & tricks to pass the exam
with two complete mock test to practice

items.title: PMP Practical Exams​ Updated 2021 Based on PMBOK 6th Edition
items.headline: Exam simulation Fully aligned with the PMBOK Guide 6th Edition 2021 To Pass your PMP Exam on your First attempt
objectives_summary: This Practical Questions & Exams course created based on the New Changes on PMP Exam 2021 and the Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge – 6th Edition.

items.title: The Risk Management Certification Program (PMI-RMP) (PMBOK6)
items.headline: Planning Risk Management, Identifying Risk, Analyzing Risk and Responding to Risk by PMBOK6
objectives_summary: Define what is meant by project risk
Recognize examples of project risk
Identify the three risk factors needed to reduce uncertainty

visible_instructors.title: George Smarts

items.headline: Learn Smartsheet Project Management quickly with this up to date training
objectives_summary: Use Smarsheet to professionally manage projects
Learn tricks and tips that come from years of experience
Learn all the features that you need quicky

items.title: PMI-ACP Certification: Agile Project Management (Beginner)
items.headline: Agile Certified Practitioner Certification Program (PMI-ACP) - Course 1 and 2 of 8 - Understanding and Adopting Agile
objectives_summary: understand characteristics of agile project management, distinguish between primary and secondary agile values, recognize agile principles, recognize the differences between defined and empirical methodologies, and compare the agile triangle of constraints with that of traditional project management.

compare the phases of traditional project management with those of the agile framework , understand how a project manager's responsibilities will change on an agile project, and distinguish between common agile methodologies.
understand agile project management, determine whether your organization should adopt agile practices, and identify factors to consider when deciding whether to adopt agile practices.
